channel.title: Portfolio on Advait Rane
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on Advait Rane

item.title: PAL
item.description: PAL - Assisting Habit formation with Machine Learning ¶ I’m a final year Computer Science student at BITS Goa, India. I’m broadly interested in Human-Centred AI applications and their ethical implications for individuals and society. I am currently pursuing my undergraduate thesis at MIT Media Lab, with the Fluid Interfaces Group. I am working as a part of the Project PAL, where we are leveraging Human-in-the-Loop Reinforcement Learning for behaviour change interventions to assist users with habit formation.

item.title: Visual Perception

I’m broadly interested in Human-Centred AI applications and their ethical implications for individuals and society. I am working as a part of the Project PAL, where we are leveraging Human-in-the-Loop Reinforcement Learning for behaviour change interventions to assist users with habit formation.
